attributes.action: Stop the NHS changing Cervical Screening Smear tests from 3 years to 5 years
attributes.additional_details:
This is risking the lives of so many women. Just because there is a lower risk for people without HPV doesn't mean there's no risk at all.

PLEASE help stop this change
attributes.background:
From 1st July 2025 the NHS plan on changing the Cervical Screening Smear tests timescales for those who test negative for HPV. This means women aged 25 - 49 will be invited every 5 years rather than every 3 years.

This is a risk to so many lives. PLEASE help us put a stop to this!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/729981
